definition: mercy as the guiding principle (idiom); the Buddhist teaching that nothing is valid except compassion

sentences.english: Respect the elders, love juniors , save all with mercy, care for others.
sentences.chinese: 敬老尊賢，愛護後進，慈悲渡衆，關懷他人。

sentences.english: Chenrezig is the embodiment of love and compassion.
sentences.chinese: 觀音是愛與慈悲的化身。

sentences.english: We all need grace in our lives.
sentences.chinese: 在生活中我們都需要慈悲。

sentences.english: In the context of Buddhist teachings and practice, these are all compassionate actions.
sentences.chinese: 從佛學教義來看，以上皆爲慈悲行徑。

sentences.english: The old man kissed his knees and called him the good God.
sentences.chinese: 那個老頭子吻着他的膝頭，稱他爲慈悲的上帝。

sentences.english: I throw myself at your mercy.
The sight of George shedding crocodile tears made me sick.
sentences.chinese: 看到喬治假慈悲，我感到噁心。

sentences.english: An image which bestows compassion into the heart of everyone.
sentences.chinese: 它能啓發每個人內在的慈悲心。

sentences.english: You mean she was crying crocodile tears?
sentences.chinese: 你是說她只是貓哭耗子假慈悲？

sentences.english: Please kindly point out to me if I said anything improperly.
sentences.chinese: 不當之處，請同修慈悲指正。

sentences.english: Along with that knowledge came an understanding of how to lead a meaningful and compassionate life.
sentences.chinese: 隨著這些了悟，他知道如何過具有意義與慈悲的生活。

sentences.english: Kindness to the enemy means cruelty to the people. (p. 163)
sentences.chinese: 對仇人的慈悲便是對人平易近的殘酷。

sentences.english: Why, why should we have compassion to our mother?
sentences.chinese: 我們爲什麼要對自己的母親有慈悲心？

sentences.english: He was a kingly and kindly figure, benevolent but not uninvolved.
sentences.chinese: 他有一副君主的與和善的面貌，慈悲，但陷入裏面去。

sentences.english: This Mrs. d'Urberville was a lady of unequaled virtues and charity.
sentences.chinese: 這位德伯夫人是一位道德最高，慈悲無比的太太。

sentences.english: We learn compassion from Guan Yin Bodhisattva and single-minded concentration from Great Strength Bodhisattva.
sentences.chinese: 學觀世音菩薩的慈悲，學大勢至菩薩的專一。

definition: (Buddhism) to deliver all living creatures from suffering (idiom)
Amitabha Buddha/the Buddha of the Western paradise/may the lord Buddha preserve us!/merciful Buddha!
Buddha-like heart (full of compassion)/spirit of Buddha (awakened to reality and no longer clinging to appearances)
Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
to bemoan the state of the universe and pity the fate of mankind
